hangouts.title: Rendezvous with Cassidoo
hangouts.alt: Cassidy Williams holding a mechanical keyboard
hangouts.description: One of the best corners of the internet, Cassidy Williams’ Discord server. You can join by supporting her Patreon or subscribing to her Twitch. Hang out  with the most fun & sus people.

hangouts.title: Party Corgi Discord
hangouts.alt: Illustration of a happy corgi with rainbow fur
hangouts.description: A very active, inclusive, supportive community of creators & learners helping each other grow. Join, chat, collaborate, ask for help and help others in their personal and professional development.

hangouts.title: Shop Talk Show
hangouts.alt: Orange badge logo on black background that says Shop Talk Show
hangouts.description: Hang out with Chris Coyier and Dave Rupert from the Shop Talk Show podcast and a lot of cool people from around the web. Shop talk, hot dramas, gear, help desk, memes, show & tell, and clubhousing.

hangouts.title: Learn With Jason
hangouts.description: Learn With Jason is a 90 minute, live, hands-on learning stream with brilliant teachers from the web community every Tuesday & Thursday. Subscribe to bury Jason and his guests in BOOPS!

hangouts.title: Build with Ben & Obsidian Office Hours
hangouts.description: Ben Hong streams every Tuesday where he builds some fun stuff with code and on Thursday where he shares his Obsidian and note taking knowledge.

hangouts.title: Cassidoo’s Stream
hangouts.description: Weekly chill stream where Cassidy answers the chats’s questions about keyboards, coding, working in tech and other fun stuff. Some times there is live coding and coworking.
